description:
Kage Hoshi reveals some disturbing information after Domon and Recca save Fuko from herself. Overhearing all of this, the next day Tokiya, an older classmate, challenges Recca to a fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mizu no Kenshi Fukushuu no Yaiba!!
The Water Swordsman: The Fang of Revenge!!
水の剣士 復讐の刃!!
